projects.title: Leo (Feat. Dominika Jonczyk)
projects.description: A high energy electronic dance music anthem with catchy vocals blending melodic phrases and fast paced spoken word.
projects.details: Leo is definitely a standout track, elevated by the capturing presence of vocalist Dominika Jonczyk. With its lush ambient textures and booming electronic rhythm, the song creates an energetic vibe that feels grand and evokes the desire to dance. Jonczyk’s haunting vocals glide effortlessly over the production, adding emotional depth to a track that rewards repeated listening. An absolutely epic and immersive listening experience.

projects.title: Asomatous Movement I: Awakening
projects.description: The first movement of the highly experimental and progressive instrumental concept album "Asomatous" featuring epic string sections, ethereal and intense synth textures and jazzy piano accompanied by eclectic and powerful drums.

projects.title: Asomatous Movement II: Pareidolia
projects.description: The second movement of the highly experimental and progressive instrumental concept album "Asomatous" characterised by highly complex jazz-inspired piano melodies and epic percussion.

projects.title: Asomatous Movement III: Vessel
projects.description: The third movement of the highly experimental and progressive instrumental concept album "Asomatous" full of intricate guitar melodies, jazzy piano motifs, and a show stopping guitar solo.

projects.title: Asomatous Movement IV: Enigma
projects.description: The Fourth movement of the highly experimental and progressive instrumental concept album "Asomatous" building from the get go with melodies inspired by Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata and the Stranger Things theme tune spanning across pianos, strings, saxophone and numerous synth textures, brought to life by an energetic combination of electronic and acoustic drums.

projects.title: Podium
projects.description: Bonus track from the "Asomatous" EP comprised of epic and energetic sections that build throughout, combining ambient soundscapes with eccentric synth melodies and head bopping beats. This one's for the dance floor!

projects.title: Cancer
projects.description: Opening track from upcoming concept album "Zodiac: Solstice I" that captures the listener with highly ambient soundscapes, immersive bass, guitar swells and a minimalistic drum pattern. This song is designed to capture the personality traits associated with the zodiac sign Cancer.

projects.title: Virgo
projects.description: The third track from upcoming concept album "Zodiac: Solstice I" designed to reflect the traits belonging to zodiac sign Virgo. Immersive piano and string melodies develop into ambient guitar passages and ending on an epic climax.

projects.title: Requiem: Infinite Plane
projects.description: B-Side track to the 2022 Single "Bird Of Paradise" designed to create a completely separate and distinct listening experience from "Bird Of paradise" by isolating and building on its orchestral components. An incredibly emotive piece of music written in memoriam of my sister who died suddenly in 2021 at age 30.
projects.details:
Requiem: Infinite Plane is a meditative ambient composition that unfolds with a sense of cosmic stillness and introspective depth. The track layers sustained synth textures and subtle harmonic shifts, creating a vast sonic landscape that evokes the feeling of drifting through an endless expanse. Its minimalist structure and gradual evolution invite listeners into a contemplative state, making it a fitting piece for moments of reflection or deep focus.

The track's title, “Requiem: Infinite Plane,” encompasses themes of mourning and infinity, which are reflected in its expansive soundscape and melancholic undertones.

projects.title: Bird Of Paradise (Instrumental)
projects.description: Instrumental version of the 2022 single "Bird Of Paradise" written in memoriam of my sister who tragically passed away at age 30 in 2021. The song is progressive in its nature and is comprised of stunning melodic passages focused largely around the guitar and bass guitar. It is detailed with layers upon layers of rich harmonic content with expansive strings and synths creating a deeply emotive and expressive listening experience.
projects.details:
Bird of Paradise (Instrumental) is a luminous ambient alternative-style composition that unfolds over 5 minutes and 14 seconds. Stripped of vocals, this instrumental version allows the intricate production to take centre stage, highlighting the skill behind crafting rich emotive soundscapes. The track features shimmering synth layers and a gentle, evolving rhythm that evokes a sense of serene introspection. Its lush textures and subtle progressions create an atmosphere that is both tranquil and emotionally resonant, making it a truly standout piece of music.

Released in 2022, as part of the Bird of Paradise single, this instrumental track showcases the ability to convey depth and emotion through purely instrumental means. The composition's ambient qualities and meticulous arrangement invite listeners into a contemplative space, reflecting the artist's signature style of blending electronic elements with ambient sensibilities.

projects.title: Distances Draw Nearer
projects.description: Dreamy shoegaze textures dissolve into post-metal walls of sound.

projects.title: Never Coming Home
projects.description: A melancholic ballad with plaintive piano and post-rock crescendo.

projects.title: Holographics
projects.description: Glitchy IDM percussion meets soaring post-rock melodies.

projects.title: Bird of Paradise [Mastered Release Edition]
projects.description: An atmospheric vocal collaboration with downtempo electronic beats.

projects.title: Brainwash
projects.description: Industrial grooves and distorted spoken-word samples exploring media indoctrination.

projects.title: Falling From Grace (Unfinished Demo)
projects.description: A raw work-in-progress with haunting vocal sketches and synth pads.

projects.title: Euphoria AXE FX Edition
projects.description: Re-amped remake with AXE-FX tones and ambient textures.

projects.title: Euphoria
projects.description: The original melodic progressive rock version.

projects.title: Heaven's Gone 2.0 (no vocals)
projects.description: Instrumental mix with lush string layers and intricate rhythmic guitars.

projects.title: Retrospect Tone
projects.description: Tone-test track with crystalline clean guitars and granular textures.

projects.title: Fluffy Kittens (pre-Mix)
projects.description: A playful progressive-metal sketch.

projects.title: Antics (Mayones Regius 8 demo clip)
projects.description: 8-string demo riffing on djent grooves.

projects.title: Antics (AXE FX II Clip)
projects.description: Alternate take of 'Antics' re-amped through the AXE-FX II.

projects.title: Axe Fx II & Mayones Regius 7+8 Test
projects.description: Tone test comparing 7-string and 8-string Mayones Regius.
